title: Underworld Twisted Fate
body:
10/13/16

When will Underworld Twisted Fate be available once more?

-Floyd Johnson

replies.body:
Since it's a legacy skin, it *may* be released from the vault and put up for sale sometime in the future, but I don't know if or when. Keep your eyes peeled and on the [Sales page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales).

Let me know if you have any questions.
It also counts as a "Harrowing" Skin, so it'll most likely be out when the harrowing happens.
